(Sorry for not posting this weekend. I'll try to be more consistent in the 
future.)

Deep within the cargohold of the Cybertronian Fire, Hysteria stirred. She 
painfully pushed several boxes off of her small, hyena body and staggered to 
her feet. She raised her plasma rifle and performed a rough scan of the area 
with what was left of her internal computer:

Internal Comp: No P*static*acons in the immediate a*static*ea.

Hysteria lowered her rifle and activated her wrist com:

"Commander Kluster,  I'm on my way to the bridge. Is everyone alright?"

Hysteria left her com open as she holstered her rifle and did a quick scan 
of her systems. A flickering status screen sppeared before her dark blue 
optics:

Internal Comp: Damage to inte*static*nal computer critical. All other 
systems are function*static*ng within safety parameters.

Hysteria sighed as she exited the cargo hold and worked her way through the 
surrounding debri towards the bridge.

*****

Stats:

Name: Hysteria

Gender: Female

Beastmode: Black Hyena w/silver speckles

Faction: Maximal

Status: Tech 'bot

Weapons: Plasma rifle, a small energon dagger, and shoulder/wrist 
cannons(<--- like the original Optimus)

Description: What Hysteria lacks in size she makes up for in weaponry. She's 
a good 'bot with a quick mind, but a little lacking when it comes to battle. 
She'd prefer to blast you from above then engage in hand to hand combat.
